underlying_goal: To get a fully implemented and tested ground-truth solution for the 4-part "worker management" problem.
friction_detail: Claude initially implemented the solution in the wrong file based on the initial prompt, and had to be redirected by the user to the correct multi-part problem directory.
primary_success: After being redirected, Claude correctly understood and implemented a complex 4-part problem, including creating a comprehensive test runner and passing all 15 test cases.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to implement 'problem 1'. Claude initially worked on the wrong file but, after user clarification, proceeded to read the full 4-part problem specification, implement a complete solution, create a test harness, and verify that all 15 test cases passed, delivering a ground-truth solution.
